item.title: Arkham: FTX/Alameda has Staked $1.25 Billion Worth of ETH and SOL
item.description: On August 1st, as per Arkham Monitoring, FTX/Alameda has placed a stake worth $1.25 billion in ETH and SOL.Last night, FTX's cold wallet staked $45 million worth of SOL, and Alameda's wallet address transferred $80 million worth of ETH into Figment.

item.title: SEC Chairman: Will Develop Framework to Allow for Trading of Crypto Securities and Traditional Securities Side by Side
item.description: On August 1st, the Chairman of the U.S. SEC, Atkins, stated that he has instructed the staff to conduct research on how to adjust the custody system in order to promote the development of the crypto asset custody business. At the same time, he directed the staff to develop a framework that enables the parallel trading of crypto securities and non-crypto securities. To facilitate the trading of tokenized securities, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission may need to consider amending the National Market System Rules. (FX168)

item.title: SEC Chair: Majority of Cryptocurrencies are Not Securities, Has Instructed to Develop Clear Rules and Implement White House Cryptocurrency Proposal
item.description: On August 1st, SEC Chairman Atkins declared that he would direct various policy departments to cooperate with the cryptocurrency special working group in order to implement the cryptocurrency-related suggestions of the White House. The staff of the committee have been given instructions to draft clear rules for cryptocurrency custody, allocation, and trading. Most crypto assets are not securities. The staff have been instructed to develop guidelines to determine when crypto assets are regarded as securities. The staff have been tasked with proposing disclosure requirements and exemption provisions for crypto assets identified as securities, and have also been instructed to collaborate with companies seeking to issue tokenized securities.

item.title: The SEC Launches Project Crypto to Advance Securities Rule Modernization and Drive Market Shift to the Blockchain
item.description: On August 1st, according to Reuters, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has initiated the Project Crypto. This initiative is aimed at promoting the modernization of securities regulations and facilitating the transition of the market to the blockchain.

item.title: NVIDIA Responds to Security Concerns: Chip Has No "Backdoor," No Risk of Remote Control
item.description: August 1st: Regarding the report of a significant security vulnerability in NVIDIA's computing power chip, NVIDIA declared: "Network security holds great importance for us. NVIDIA's chips do not possess a 'backdoor' that enables any remote access or control over these chips."

item.title: Ethereum Tenth Anniversary Torch Commemorative NFT Minting Consumed a Total of $584,000 USD Worth of ETH Gas
item.description: August 1st. As per on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), 781,147 addresses took part in the Ethereum 10th Anniversary commemorative NFT minting and collectively spent 153.7 ETH on Gas fees, which is approximately $584,000.Previous reports showed that the Ethereum 10th Anniversary torch commemorative NFT minting has come to an end. The total supply exceeded 780,000 tokens and there were over 660,000 holder addresses.

item.title: 「3963 BTC Ancient Whale Holding in 14.5-Year Dormancy」 Sells Another 180 BTC
item.description: On August 1st, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "ancient whale that had been silent for 14.5 years and held 3,963 BTC" once again sold 180 BTC. In the past week, it is said that it has sold 330 BTC, which is about $29.57 million, and the cost basis is as low as $0.37.Thirty minutes ago, it transferred 180 BTC (about $21.25 million) to a liquidity provider-related address bc1q5...zr2xn, which has interacted with institutions such as B2C2/Galaxy/Coinbase.

item.title: CryptoQuant: Bitcoin sees its third large-scale profit-taking of this bull market, with selling pressure above $120,000 led by new entrant whales.
item.description: On July 31st, CryptoQuant released an article stating, "Bitcoin has just gone through the third round of large-scale profit-taking during this bull market. By the end of July, the realized profit soared to between $6 billion and $8 billion, a level similar to the peaks in March and December 2024. The main driving force behind the sell-off above $120,000 in this round was the newly arrived whales."

item.title: Ethereum 10th Anniversary Torch Commemorative NFT Minting Concluded, with Total Supply Exceeding 780,000
item.description: On July 31st, the Ethereum Tenth Anniversary Torch Commemorative NFT minting has come to an end. A total of more than 780,000 pieces were minted, and there are over 660,000 holder addresses.BlockBeats previously reported that Ethereum launched "The Torch" NFT to pay tribute to those who have shaped its development and values during the first decade of Ethereum and to contribute to the future development of Ethereum. In the 10 days prior to Ethereum's tenth anniversary, this Torch NFT symbolically passed among wallets. On July 30th, the Torch NFT was burned to commemorate the tenth anniversary of Ethereum's founding. On that day, everyone could mint a commemorative NFT.

item.title: pump.fun Solana Launchpad's Market Share in the Last 24 Hours Rises to 29.9%
item.description: On July 31st, according to the Jupiter Data Dashboard, in the past 24 hours within the Solana launchpad market share ranking, Letsbonk held the first position with 53.7%, pump.fun came in second with 29.9%, and Jup Studio took the third place with 5.51%.
